mapper.insert: insert into lecture(lec_no, lec_name, lec_sdate, lec_edate, lec_info, lec_stime, lec_etime, lec_count, lec_filename, lec_bcatg, lec_scatg, lec_price, lec_grade, lec_jnum, lec_cnum, tea_no, loc_no) values((seq_lno.nextval), #{lecName}, #{lecSdate}, #{lecEdate}, #{lecInfo}, #{lecStime}, #{lecEtime}, #{lecCount}, #{lecFilename}, #{lecBcatg}, #{lecScatg}, #{lecPrice}, #{lecGrade}, #{lecJnum}, #{lecCnum}, #{teaNo}, #{locNo})
mapper.select: select l.lec_no, l.lec_name, t.tea_name, l.lec_sdate, l.lec_edate, l.lec_stime, l.lec_etime, l.lec_count, l.lec_bcatg, l.lec_scatg, l.lec_price, l.lec_grade, l.lec_cnum, ll.loc_name from lecture l join Teacher t on (l.tea_no = t.tea_no) join LectureLocation ll on (l.loc_no = ll.loc_no) order by lec_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into teacher (tea_no, tea_name, tea_age, tea_info, tea_edate) values((seq_tno.nextval), #{teaName}, #{teaAge}, #{teaInfo}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select tea_no, tea_name, tea_age, TO_CHAR(tea_edate,'YY.MM.DD') as "tea_edate", tea_status from teacher order by tea_no desc
select count(*) from teacher where tea_status = 'Y'
